Does the giant otter live in South America?	Yes
Does the giant otter live in South America?	Yes
Does the giant otter live in South America?	yes
Do otters have claws?	Yes
Do otters have claws?	yes
Do otters eat fish?	Yes
Do otters eat fish?	yes
What is an otter's den called?	A holt
What is an otter's den called?	holt
Where do sea otters live?	Beside water
Where do sea otters live?	Pacific coast of North America
Why are otters vulnerable to prey depletion?	Prey-dependence
Why are otters vulnerable to prey depletion?	prey-dependency
Do otters enjoy playing?	Yes
Do otters enjoy playing?	yes
Do sea otters have a layer of fat like whales?	No
Do sea otters have a layer of fat like whales?	no
Is the otter in the same family as the badger?	Yes
Is the otter in the same family as the badger?	yes
